description: Strategic thinking library - world-class frameworks applied to real problems
overview: Beyond Prismatica's own frameworks, this is curated wisdom from business physics, game theory, cognitive science, and strategic thinking. The patterns that work everywhere, synthesized and made actionable.

business-physics.summary: Every business is a physical system. Energy flows, forces interact, equilibrium shifts. Apply physics principles to see business dynamics clearly.
business-physics.key_concepts: Conservation laws, feedback loops, equilibrium states, force vectors, momentum, inertia
business-physics.when_relevant: System thinking, dynamics understanding, why things resist change, momentum questions

game-theory.summary: How finite beings navigate infinite possibilities. Not just Nash equilibria - practical game theory for business decisions.
game-theory.key_concepts: Dominant strategies, coordination games, signaling, commitment, sequential moves, information asymmetry
game-theory.when_relevant: Competitive strategy, pricing decisions, negotiation, strategic positioning, multi-player dynamics

cognitive-patterns.summary: How humans actually make decisions vs how they think they do. Biases, heuristics, mental shortcuts that shape behavior.
cognitive-patterns.key_concepts: Anchoring, loss aversion, status quo bias, framing effects, social proof, scarcity
cognitive-patterns.when_relevant: User behavior, decision design, persuasion, why rational arguments fail, behavior change

decision-frameworks.summary: Structured approaches to complex decisions. When intuition isn't enough, use frameworks that work.
decision-frameworks.key_concepts: Expected value, reversible vs irreversible decisions, regret minimization, optionality, decision trees
decision-frameworks.when_relevant: High-stakes decisions, uncertainty, strategic bets, risk assessment, option evaluation

usage_note: Wisdom library supplements Prismatica frameworks. Use when generic strategic thinking helps. Don't force - only relevant when user's problem maps to these patterns.
expansion_plan: Will add: Systems thinking, organizational behavior, market dynamics, innovation patterns, negotiation theory
